attributes.action: Prevent Government Funds being Used to Assist Rangers FC Financial Problems
attributes.additional_details:
SNP Government has indicated it is lobbying to "help provide assistance to Rangers Football Club" (RFC) after its enter into administration.

RFC are currently facing £9million unpaid PAYE/NI contributions for the past 9 months, as well as a potential £75million bill for tax avoidance spanning 10 years.

We Cannot allow government money be used to save a company that is in debted to HMRC.
